education.cardDetailedText:
- Completed research towards autonomous UAV control with a focus on low cost sensors.

 Developed simulation software to test theoretical concepts.

- Designed and built a functional UAV prototype utilizing proximity sensors which tracks vertical surfaces to provide real world experimental data

education.cardTitle: Bachelor of Engineering (Mechatronics), First Class Honors
education.cardDetailedText:
Key papers taken include:
- Robotics
- Computer Vision
- Machine Learning
- Embedded Systems
 - Controls
